header.title: Parser Transformer
header.abstract: This document describes the parser transformer of Cocoon.

s1.title: Parser Transformer
s1.p: The parser transformer builds a syntax tree of a list of lexemes (tokens), by using a grammar file.

ul.li: Cacheable: yes - uses the last modification date of the grammar document for validation.

s1.p: The parser uses the following elements from the SAX stream, and replaces them through a syntax tree.
s1.source: <lexemes xmlns="http://chaperon.sourceforge.net/schema/lexemes/1.0"> <lexeme symbol="word" text="..."/> <lexeme symbol="word" text="..."/> <lexeme symbol="word" text="..."/> <lexeme symbol="punctation" text="..."/> </lexemes>
s1.p: The parser transformer will replace those elements with a syntax tree.
A detailed explanation of function and the grammar format can be found at Chaperon.
